name: SmartPortSmartBuilding
0:
”Alexa, turn the lights on”
”Alexa, lock the front door”
”Alexa, turn the lights off”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to your new home, this skill will enable you to directly control all the preinstalled smart home devices installed in your home from your Alexa and the Alexa mobile application.

This means devices such as your home's smart lights may be turned on/off or your front door locked all through Alexa, you are also able to combine these with other smart devices you might have and create scenes and routines.

Link your Sentient Property Services account to this skill to get started.

For a list of your home's smart capabilities or for any questions regarding connecting to the skill please see you leasing agent.
